trans-unit.source: Represents the `<system.identityModel.services>` section in a configuration file.
The `<system.identityModel.services>` section configures authentication using WS-Federation protocol.
It contains elements that configure the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> (WSFAM) and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> (SAM).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection"></xref> class.
Gets a reference to the `<system.identityModel.services>` section from the configuration file.
The `<system.identityModel.services>` section from the configuration file.
`null` if the configuration file does not contain a `<system.identityModel.services>` section.
Gets the unnamed `<federationConfiguration>` element from the configuration file.

The unnamed `<federationConfiguration>` element does not have its `name` attribute set (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`).
The unnamed `<federationConfiguration>` element from the configuration file.
`null` if the configuration file does not contain a `<system.identityModel.services>` section.
Gets the collection of `<federationConfiguration>` elements configured in this `<system.identityModel.services>` section.
A collection that contains all of the `<federationConfiguration>` elements configured in this `<system.identityModel.services>` section.
A constant that defines the name of the configuration section; "system.identityModel.services".
